language.languageTerm: The text on the gravestones is in Hebrew, while the text written on the back of the photograph is in English.

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#500, Graves in Leadville Jewish Cemetery Oc. 1980 Photographer Gay Lasher.'' On envelope: ''#500 Jewish Graves in Leadville.''

mods.abstract: Two grave sites at an unidentified Leadville, Colorado Cemetery. The inscriptions on the headstones are a mix of Hebrew and English. These gravestones are for Anna Oliner, 1848-1916, and Herman Oliner, 1850-1911.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
